title: And Through Here the Exit (1957) Comedy, Mystery | French film directed by Willy Rozier

sources.title: And Through Here the Exit (1957) Comedy, Mystery | French film directed by Willy Rozier
sources.description:
Slim Maden (Tony Wright), a man with a knack for trouble, finds himself mistaken for Carlos, a shady weapons trader, and is swept into a whirlwind of danger by the alluring Myrna (Dominique Wilms). As rival gangs close in, Slim dodges kidnappings, car chases, and cabaret chaos, all while trying to keep his head above water. With humor, action, and a dash of romance, Slim’s adventure is a wild ride from start to finish.

Original title: Et par ici la sortie (1957) AKA: And Through Here the Exit

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/2TCa2iU89BQ


Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: Peter Cheyney, Willy Rozier
Actors: Tony Wright, Dominique Wilms, Dany Dauberson
Genre:  French Cinema, Comedy,
Release Date: March 1, 1957 (France)

@CultCinemaClassics
